intro: Survive the dangers, lead your pack, and become the jungle king.
description:
Deep within the lush, dangerous heart of the tropical jungle, survival is never guaranteed — and power is never given. You are the Young Male, an ambitious gorilla with a destiny yet to be earned. To become the true Alpha, you must prove yourself through strength, wisdom, and unshakable leadership.

Gorilla Jungle King Simulator is an immersive animal survival adventure where every choice shapes your legacy. Unite scattered gorillas into a loyal pack, guide them to food, guard them from predators, and earn their trust through battle and care. A pack is more than allies — it’s your family, and its future depends on you.

Face the primal dangers of the wild:
• Survive deadly night hunts by leopards.
• Outsmart crocodile ambushes by riverbanks.
• Confront rival gorillas who challenge your right to lead.

Forage rare fruits that enhance strength and stamina, find hidden shelters from monsoon storms, and protect the weak as your numbers grow. But leadership is more than survival — it’s legacy. When your pack is ready, challenge the mighty clan and rise as the king of the jungle.
